description: [BPFDoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1161) sets the `MYSQL_HISTFILE` and `HISTFILE` to `/dev/null` preventing the shell and MySQL from logging history in `/proc/<PID>/environ`.(Citation: Sandfly BPFDoor 2022)

external_references.description: The Sandfly Security Team. (2022, May 11). BPFDoor - An Evasive Linux Backdoor Technical Analysis. Retrieved September 29, 2023.
